main event: A civilian observer sighted a stationary ovoid object with a reddish light over Macon, Georgia on March 14, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 30 minutes,The object seemed to be suspended instantly under broken clouds,The observer was a 19-year-old white male attending Mercer University with some college education,The investigation concluded that the object may have been the star 'Leo',No aircraft were identified in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: one ovoid object with a reddish and tiny colored red light
witness description: 19-year-old white male, student at Mercer University, sound of mind
